name: Asian Americans Advancing Justice – Asian Law Caucus
description: The mission of Asian Americans Advancing Justice – Asian Law Caucus is to promote, advance, and represent the legal and civil rights of Asian Pacific Islander communities. The organization provides free legal consultation and, in some cases, representation to community members on immigration matters, housing, workers' rights, and civil and constitutional rights, including unjust surveillance, profiling, and police misconduct.
